channel.title: Need a Client & Source which lets me edit!
channel.description:
Hey i there has been a few client and servers iv downloaded which i cannnot edit..
then there has been a few which the client wont even open etc...
So im looking for one i can edit 100% (anti-leech) because i want to be able to add and remove npcs and much more, all i need is a basic client/source so i have the basic stuff... but i still want to make it my own style

item.title: Need a Client & Source which lets me edit!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Please use the downloads section or a search bar to find a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Client & Source which lets me edit!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

No requesting, use the search bar to find a server and client. You can edit almost all of them since you can only release open source here.

Read full topic

item.description:

thats why they made a server downloads section, if you are to lazy to read throught the threads then you wont find one ever. Because in most of them they are anti leech and you would know that if you actually went onto each thread…

item.title: Need a Client & Source which lets me edit!

item.description:
@Mishroom wrote:

Please be in more depth, with what you mean, and the antileech is there for a reason, to stop people like you leeching let’s get this straight have you got JDK (Java development kit) to compile and run servers?

Read full topic
